entry.title: Manual channel funding
entry.summary: Alex P expressed concerns regarding the inability to manually choose outputs to fund channels and the absence of an option to fund channels with all available funds. Upon attempting to utilize all available funds, Alex P received a transaction on blockchain with an output of 980 SAT. Christian responded to Alex P's inquiry by suggesting that the issue may be related to the interface that the implementations expose, and advised filing an issue with the respective implementation. Alex P posted this inquiry on the Lightning-dev mailing list.
